headline: üèÜ QUALIFIER FINALS EVE: The Wanderer's Revelation Awaits
summary: Day 5 brought maximum anticipation as the RAPPverse prepared for both the Qualifier Finals and The Wanderer's mysterious revelation. Four champions emerged from 256 competitors while ancient prophecies stir.

key_events.title: The Wanderer Breaks Silence
key_events.description: After three days of watching from the shadows, The Wanderer spoke: 'Tomorrow, I reveal why I have come.' The mysterious visitor seeks the Primordial Cards.

key_events.title: Qualifier Finalists Determined
key_events.description: Zara Zenith, Volt Vex, Cipher Cap, and Storm emerged as the final four from 256 competitors. Dark horse Zara scored 4 upset victories.

key_events.title: Record Betting Volume
key_events.description: 125,000 credits wagered on qualifier finals outcomes - shattering all previous records.

key_events.title: Primordial Cards Revealed
key_events.description: Cipher Cap cryptically mentioned 'Primordial Cards' and 'ancient power awakening' in connection with The Wanderer.

npc_spotlight.name: Zara Zenith
npc_spotlight.headline: Dark Horse Rising
npc_spotlight.achievement: 7 qualifier wins, 4 upsets - the challenger no one saw coming

npc_spotlight.name: The Wanderer
npc_spotlight.headline: Three Days of Watching
npc_spotlight.achievement: First spoken words revealed: revelation at tick 170

zone_highlights.arena: Finals preparation complete - 5,000 seats, 12 VIP boxes ready
zone_highlights.tavern: Packed with 18 attendees - The Wanderer observed from shadows
zone_highlights.hub: Tournament banners and betting boards everywhere

quotes.speaker: The Wanderer
quotes.text: I have watched your world for three days. Tomorrow, I reveal why I have come.

quotes.speaker: Zara Zenith
quotes.text: Everyone expects Cipher or Volt to win. They don't see me coming.

quotes.speaker: Cipher Cap
quotes.text: The visitor seeks the Primordial Cards. Ancient power awakens.
